Name: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Description: A young wizard, Harry Potter, embarks on a magical journey at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

Name: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Description: Harry returns to Hogwarts for his second year and faces new dangers, including the legend of the Chamber of Secrets.

Name: The Witcher: The Last Wish
Description: A collection of short stories following Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter known as a Witcher.

Name: The Witcher: Blood of Elves
Description: Geralt takes in young Ciri and trains her to become a Witcher while dark forces seek her mysterious power.

Name: The Hobbit
Description: A classic tale of adventure as Bilbo Baggins embarks on a journey to reclaim a kingdom from a dragon.

Name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
Description: Frodo Baggins sets out on a journey to destroy the One Ring and save Middle-earth.

Name: A Game of Thrones
Description: The first book in the epic fantasy series A Song of Ice and Fire by George R.R. Martin.

Name: Eragon
Description: A young farm boy discovers a dragon egg and is thrust into a battle against an evil empire.

Name: The Name of the Wind
Description: The story of Kvothe, a gifted young man who grows to be a legendary figure in magic and music.

Name: Mistborn: The Final Empire
Description: A world ruled by a dark lord, where magic is wielded through metals, and a rebellion rises.

Name: Dune
Description: A young nobleman, Paul Atreides, must navigate political intrigue and mysticism on the desert planet Arrakis.

Name: The Catcher in the Rye
Description: A novel about teenage angst and alienation, following Holden Caulfield in New York City.
A dystopian novel about a totalitarian regime that controls every aspect of life and thought.

Name: Brave New World
Description: A futuristic world where people are controlled through pleasure and conditioning.

Name: To Kill a Mockingbird
Description: A novel about racial injustice and moral growth in the American South.
